channel.title: Fiber on Chris Short
channel.description: Recent content in Fiber on Chris Short

item.title: The Demise of Google Fiber and Internet Under Dirt
item.description: If you have not heard the news, Google Fiber is no longer expanding its installation in the 10 markets they service and the head of Google Access (the Google Fiber overlord company), Craig Barratt, is stepping down. Also in the news, was a little-publicized statement from AT&T’s chief executive, Randall Stephenson, where he said, “I will be sorely disappointed if we are not going head-to-head” with cable companies by 2021.
